detailedSummary: Days of the week in Spanish: lunes (Monday), martes (Tuesday), miércoles (Wednesday), jueves (Thursday), viernes (Friday), sábado (Saturday), domingo (Sunday).
whyItMatters: Mastering Days of the Week is essential for building a strong foundation in spanish - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
